name: Dirtier the Better
description: Increase ATK by 5% after attacking from behind. (Max 100%)

name: Two-Part Plan
description: Attack twice when attacking with sword specials.

name: Soft Sword
description: Parry rate is boosted by 15% when swords are equipped.

name: Refined Swordplay
description: Sword skill SP cost -50%.

name: Zeni Geba
description: Increase HL gained by 50% & Mana gained by 50%.

name: Vital Strike
description: Increase critical damage by 50%.

name: Hell Unleashed
description: Increase damage dealt by 50% when in Hell Mode.

name: Syndicate Head
description: Increase max HP and SP by 10% of number of digits of held HL.

name: Wave of Restoration
description: Cure and heal allies within 2 panels by 30% of own max HP when turn ends.

name: Cheerful Aura
description: Increase Joint Attack rate of adjacent allies by 20%.

name: Super-Positivity
description: When in combat at base panel, increase own abilities by 100%.

name: Development Support
description: Increase EXP gained by adjacent allies by 50%.

name: Overbig
description: Increase number of continuing turns by 1 when Jumbified.

name: EM Barrier
description: Nullify damage taken when attacked. (Once per stage)

name: Shogun's Influence
description: If 2 or more allies are within 2 panels, boost own abilities by 50%.

name: Shogun's Orders
description: Boost abilities of allies on map by 20%.

name: Human Shield
description: Controlled units within 2 panels will be covered when attacked.

name: Tactical Guidance
description: Boost ATK for adjacent ally units by 20%.

name: Wariness
description: 50% of facing attacker when attacked from behind.

name: Keen Mind
description: Increase INT by 30%.

name: Cautious Soul
description: Increases Evasion Rate by 50% when target is 2 panels or more away.

name: Extreme Takeover
description: 50% chance of stealing after defeating enemy unit.

name: Distance Shot
description: Increase critical damage by 10% per panel away from enemy.

name: HE Rounds
description: Increase critical rate by 20% when guns are equipped.

name: Phantom's Mask
description: Increase Equipment ability by 20% when glasses are equipped.

name: Ready, Snort!
description: Increase ATK by 30% when performing a fire attack.

name: Phantastic Escape
description: Increase movement by X after making an attack.

name: Unclouded Vision
description: Guaranteed hit when attacking a unit X or more panels away.

name: Sword Limitations
description: Can't equip swords. Decrease stats by 25%.

name: Higan's Pledge
description: Decrease damage taken when attacked by monster units by 50%.

name: Shinrabanshosai
description: Increase range by 2 and counter-attacks by 5 when using spears.

name: Spear Parry
description: Can parry when equipped with a spear.

name: Peerless
description: Increase equipped weapon's ability when no armor is equipped by 200%.

name: Intimidating Aura
description: Decrease Evasion rate for enemies within 2 panels by -30%.

name: Heavy Stance
description: Increase defense power by 50%. Can't be lifted.
notes: Formerly "Increase DEF by 50%. Can't Lift."

name: Vainglory
description: Increase abilities by 50% when no other units enter battle.

name: Foreseeing Mag.
description: Adjacent allies always hit when attacking.

name: Foreseeing Mag. 2.0
description: Adjacent allies always land critical hits when attacking.

name: Fatality
description: Can't enter battle.

name: Self-Repairing
description: Restore 20% of HP and SP if no movement or action taken at end of turn.

name: Pure Bonds
description: Boost damage dealt by 3% per number of combos. (Max 60%)

name: Powerful Souls
description: Increase Max HP by 25% and max SP by 25%.

name: A Curious Friend
description: Increase ATK and DEF by 30% when Yeyasu is deployed as an ally.

name: Machine Learning
description: Decrease damage taken by 50% when attacked with a previously-used Special.

name: Insane Power
description: Increase ATK by 75% and DEF -25%.

name: Daddy-Daughter Time!
description: Increase abilities by 50% when Fuji is deployed as an ally.

name: Going All Out
description: Nicks and parries don't reduce damage dealt.

name: Pouncing Tiger
description: When HP is reduced by 20%, increase ATK by 20%.

name: Hidden Turtle
description: When HP is reduced by 20%, increase DEF by 20%.

name: Death and Rebirth
description: When killing enemy unit using Specials, restore used SP.

name: Freeze Dry
description: Adjacent enemies' Movement becomes 1.

name: Resonating Souls
description: At end of turn, increase abilities by 5%. (Max 100%)

name: Amplified Souls
description: At end of turn, increase abilities by 10%. (Max 100%)

name: Soulkeeper Mag.
description: Each time an ally dies, increase defense power by 10%. (Max 100%)

name: Soulkeeper Mag. 2.0
description: When attacking, 50% of damage dealt is also dealt to SP.

name: Weapon Fan
description: Increases Weapon Mastery growth speed by 1 rank for all Weapon Mastery.

name: Weapon Researcher
description: Increase ATK power by 5% per ally with same weapon type as you.

name: Weapon Expert
description: Increase ATK power by 5% per ally with different weapon type than you.

name: Weapon Otaku
description: Decrease damage taken by 50% when attacked by unit with same weapon type as you.

name: Weapon Mania
description: Increase equipped weapon's ability by 30%.

name: The Demmodore
description: When allies within 5 panels are attacked, decrease damage taken by 25%.

name: Merciless Command
description: Increase ATK by 25% for allies within 3 panels. Take 10% of HP as damage.
notes: Both the attack power and the damage apply to allies, not to evility owner.

name: Howling Spirit
description: ATK of enemies within 2 panels becomes -30%.

name: Calm Strength
description: Ignore damage equal to or under 5% of max HP.

name: Noble Cause
description: Boost abilities of allies on map by 10%.

name: Honed Senses
description: Always evades when target is 4 or more panels away.

name: Ultimate Swordsman
description: Increase damage dealt by 100% when using Special.

name: Super-Deity
description: Increases ATK and DEF by 75%.

name: Protection Mag.
description: Increase DEF by 100%.
notes: Defense power, not DEF stat.

name: Ocean Mag.
description: Reverse damage when hit with water attacks.

name: SpecOps Angels
description: When attacking a demon, increase damage dealt by 50%. Justice!

name: S. Princess Mag.
description: Increase ATK by 20% for allies within 3 panels.
notes: To be clear, this is "increase allies within 3 panels' attack power by 20%" and not "increase Sakoora's attack power by 20% per ally within 3 panels".

name: Gambling Mag.
description: When attacked, 50% chance of taking 0 damage.

name: Resale Mag.
description: Decrease cost of items purchased by 50%. Increase price for items sold by 100%.

name: H. Springs Mag.
description: At end of turn, restore 20% of HP for allies on the map.

name: Ping-Pong Mag.
description: Serve improved by 99,990,000.

name: Subjugation Mag.
description: Each time an enemy dies, increase stats by 20%. (Max 200%)

name: Head Mag.
description: No damage taken when on Geo Panel.
notes: Yes, even if the Geo Panel has no geo effect active.

name: Charisma
description: Increase stats of allies on map by 30%.

name: Hado
description: Increases damage dealt when attacking adjacent units by 500%.

name: Kazan
description: Completely restore HP of all allies on map at end of turn.

name: Haburika
description: Reverse damage taken by all units.

name: Kijo
description: Flip all units' genders.

name: Mawaku
description: When hit with an attack, control target unit.
notes: Applies the Puppet status, so Puppet Vaccine still blocks it.

name: Hayu
description: When attacking, restore own HP and SP by 20% per target unit.

name: Mangestu
description: Allies take 0 damage on odd turns. Ignore enemies' DEF on even turns.

name: Mushi
description: When attacking, ignore target's DEF.

name: Dodo
description: When Jumibified, area of attack becomes entire map.

name: Saika
description: At end of turn, HP of enemies on map becomes 1.

name: Shiki
description: When an ally dies, revive with 20% to stats (1 time max for each unit).
notes: Even once Shiki Zesshosai dies, enemies still have the revive saved up...

name: Sazan
description: 0 damage taken when hit with weapon skill.

name: Jiro
description: Deal a deathblow to target unit.

name: Rekka
description: Nullifies Hell Mode for all units, and nullifies explosion for self.

name: Zessho
description: When enemy unit dies, forces all enemies on map to die.

name: Ultimate Force
description: Use Special on target when enemy unit enters battle.

name: S.O. Charge
description: Increase attack and defense power by 10% per ally on the map.
notes: (Not including self.)

name: S.O. Legion
description: At end of turn, summon 3 allies to the map. (Cannot exceed map limit.)

name: S.O. Force II
description: Use Special 3 times on target when enemy unit enters battle.

name: S.O. Charge II
description: Increase attack and defense power by 20% per ally on the map.
notes: (Not including self.)

name: S.O. Legion II
description: At end of turn, summon 5 allies to the map. (Cannot exceed map limit.)

name: Wild Cry
description: Increase stats by 10% per adjacent enemy unit.

name: Vanguard
description: Increase HP by 5%, ATK by 5%, and DEF by 5%.

name: Power Axe
description: Increase damage dealt by 25% when equipped with an axe.

name: Fighting Instinct
description: Increase stats by 3% per elapsed turn. (Max 60%)

name: Boiling Blood
description: Increase stats by 3% per enemy on the map.

name: Super Guts
description: For every 5% of HP lost, decrease damage taken by 5%. (Max 50%)

name: Assault Attack
description: Boost damage dealt by 10% per panels moved this turn. (Max 200%).

name: Defense Mastery
description: Increase DEF Equipment Compatibility by 20%.
notes: Formerly "Increase Equipment Compatibility by 20%."

name: Hard Effort
description: Increase EXP gained when attacked by higher-leveled unit by 50%.

name: Pierce
description: Attack target number has no effect on power when attacking normally.

name: Full Speed Ahead
description: For 1 turn only, add 3 to Movement.

name: Hit and Run
description: Can move again after defeating an enemy unit.
notes: Formerly "Can move again if they defeat an enemy unit after moving."

name: M. Convergence
description: When using Specials, increase attack power by 30% and SP cost by 50%.
notes: Formerly "When using Specials, increase ATK by 30% and SP cost by 50%."

name: Casting Mastery
description: Increase INT Equipment Compatibility by 20%.

name: Magical Discipline
description: Increase Skill EXP gain by 50%.
notes: Formerly "Increase EXP gain by 50%."

name: Enlarge
description: Increase magic range by 2 and SP cost by 50%.

name: Lights of Life
description: If SP is insufficient for Specials, consume HP instead.

name: Over the Limit
description: Increase ATK by 50% when using Specials. Costs 10% SP each turn.

name: Magic Moderation
description: Consume -50% SP when using Specials.

name: Caster
description: Increase SP by 5%, INT by 5%, and RES by 5%.

name: Expand
description: Increase spell area by 1.
notes: Formerly "Increase spell area by 1%."

name: Damage Convert
description: Increase INT by 10% when attacked. (Max 100%)

name: Magic Collection
description: Recover SP equal to 5% of damage dealt when attacking.

name: Overflowing Magic
description: When remaining SP is 50% or more, increase Specials ATK power by 30%.

name: Fury
description: Increase ATK power by 25% per counter-attack in a single turn. (Max 100%)

name: Grappler
description: Decrease damage taken from counter-attacks by 50%.

name: Retribution
description: Increase number of counter-attacks by 2.
notes: Formerly "Increase number of counter-attacks by 2%."

name: Blasting Fist
description: Decrease target's DEF power by -10% when using a Fist. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Counter Chance
description: Increase critical rate of counter-attacks by 50%.

name: Forced Counter
description: Force target unit to counter-attack. (Max 20 times)

name: Rapid Move
description: Increase Evasion by 3% per panel moved in a single turn. (Max 64%)

name: Wisdom Fist
description: Increase attack range when fists are equipped by 1 panel(s).

name: Quick Thinking
description: Increase Joint Attack rate by 20% when attacking.

name: Eye for an Eye
description: Guaranteed hit when counter-attacking.

name: Smash Hit
description: Increase damage by 50% when using Specials with Knockback.

name: Counter Dodge
description: Always dodge counter-attacks

name: Medical Aid
description: Cure all ailments when using healing Specials.

name: Healing Plus
description: Increase heal amount by 30% when using healing Specials.

name: Staff Rebellion
description: Damage of normal attacks is based on RES when equipped with a staff.

name: Light Salvation
description: When using healing Specials, recover extra 30% of own Max HP.

name: Staff of Healing
description: Reverse damage dealt by normal attacks when equipped with a staff.

name: Light Protection
description: When using healing Specials, increase DEF & RES of target unit by 30%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Expert Healer
description: Increase amount restored by 100% when using healing Specials.

name: Res. Mastery
description: Increase RES Equipment Compatibility by 20%.

name: Arrow Rebellion
description: Normal attack damage is based on RES & HIT when equipped with a bow.

name: Heart of Affection
description: When target's HP is maxxed out with a healing Special, increase own RES by 10%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Dynamic Arrow
description: Reverse damage dealt by normal attacks when equipped with a bow.

name: Advanced Heal
description: Restore extra 25% of target HP when using healing Specials.

name: Treasure Hunt
description: 30% chance of generating a chest when defeating an enemy.
notes: Chest's item rank depends on the map's item rank, not on the enemy?

name: Dodge Mastery
description: Increase SPD Equipment Compatibility by 20%.

name: Stealing Senses
description: 10% chance of additional reward when defeating chests and level spheres.

name: Evade Danger
description: Nullify explosive damage.

name: Lucky Finger
description: When defeating treasure chests, increase Item Rank by 1.

name: Loot Appraisal
description: When defeating treasure chests, Item Rarity increases.

name: Art of Robbery
description: Steal success rate increased by 100%.
notes: I.e., doubled.

name: Heart Catch
description: Gain extra 10% EXP of unit attacked during a successful steal.

name: Quickfooted
description: Increase movement by 1 and SPD by 10%.

name: Second Challenge
description: When steal fails, attempt again.

name: Reaching Hands
description: When using hand item, add 3 to range.

name: Prideful Thief
description: For every successful steal, add 10% to HIT. (Max 100%)

name: Potential Energy
description: Increase ATK power by 30% when attacking unit at a lower elevation.

name: Hunter's Distance
description: Increase HIT by 30% when attacking nonadjacent enemy.

name: Lady Killer
description: Increase damage by 30% when attacking female units.

name: Bow Focus
description: Add 30% of base HIT to ATK when equipped with a bow.

name: Rear Attack
description: Always hit when attacking from behind.

name: Sturdy Bow
description: Accuracy rate is -50%. Increase damage dealt by 60%.

name: Support Attack
description: Attack an enemy unit within range when an ally unit attacks it.

name: Crack Shot
description: Increase ATK by 5%, HIT by 5%, and SPD by 5%.

name: Bow Range
description: Increase attack range by 1 panel(s) when equipped with a bow.

name: Arrow in the Knee
description: When attacking with a bow, target unit's SPD becomes -10%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Fly Swatter
description: Increase attack power by 50% when attacking flying units.

name: Support Fire
description: Increase damage dealt with support attacks by 50%.

name: Gun Tricks
description: Add 30% of base HIT to SPD when equipped with a gun.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Attacking an enemy 3 or more panels away increases accuracy by 100%.

name: Sniping
description: Attack range increased by 2 panel(s) when gun is equipped.

name: Assist
description: Register attack to give subsequent attacks 100% accuracy.

name: Flying Bullets
description: Normal attacks with guns can target any panel in range.

name: Marking
description: Register attack to increase damage of subsequent ally units by 25%.

name: Second Attack
description: Increase attack power by 30% when the combo count is 2 or more.

name: Golden Touch
description: Increase HL gained when defeating enemies by 100%.
notes: Formerly "Increase HL gained when defeating by 100%."

name: Coin Toss
description: Increase ATK power by 20%. Use 1% of HL when attacking. (Max 100,000 HL)

name: Wide Shot
description: When equipped with a gun, normal attack area is increased.

name: Combination
description: Add 1 to combos when attacking.

name: Point-Blank
description: When attacking adjacent unit, add 75% to damage dealt.

name: Mirage
description: 50% chance of evading when attacked by an adjacent unit.

name: Sharp Eye
description: Increase critical rate by 15%.

name: Sasuke
description: Increase movement by 2 and jump power by 30.

name: Smokebomb
description: When attacking, target unit will not counter-attack.

name: Assassination
description: Increase damage dealt by 50% when attacking from behind.

name: Secret Recon
description: Increase movement by 5, but Max HP becomes 1.

name: Heat Haze
description: When attacked by 2 or more unit(s), increase evasion rate by 50%.

name: Shadow Art
description: Increase stats by 10% for each attack evaded. (Max 100%)

name: Subversion
description: When attacking, target unit's HIT becomes -10%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Shield Art
description: When attacked, cover a random ally up to X time(s) per turn.

name: Scouting Mission
description: Increase Mystery Room appearance by 10% when going through Item Worlds.

name: Evade Danger
description: Increase evasion rate by 50% when remaining HP is 25% or less.

name: Head-to-Head
description: Increase damage dealt by 50% when attacking enemies from the front.

name: Ensure Victory
description: When attacking on first turn, increase attack power by 50%.

name: Yoroi-Doshi
description: When attacking normally, deal fixed damage equal to 25% of own ATK.

name: Sword Catch
description: When attacked from front, 20% chance of taking 0 damage.

name: Inauspiciousness
description: Increase damage dealt by 25% when attacking humanoid units.

name: Divine Wind
description: When remaining HP is 25% or less, increase critical damage by 100%.

name: Clear Mind
description: Increase damage dealt by 50% when attacking a single unit.

name: Mind's Eye
description: Nullify any attack revisions when attacked from the side or behind.

name: Banishing Evil
description: Increase damage dealt by 25% when attacking enemy monsters.

name: Euthanasia
description: Normal attacks will deathblow targets with less than 25% HP.

name: Duelist
description: Increase damage dealt by 75% if only 1 enemy unit is on the map.

name: To the Death
description: Increase damage taken by 30%, but increase damage dealt by 50%.

name: Aegis
description: Reduce damage taken by 30% when attacked from front.

name: Last Fortress
description: When remaining HP is 25% or less, increase DEF & RES by 30%.

name: Advance Guard
description: When defending, decrease damage taken by 50%.

name: Spear Defense
description: Add 30% of base ATK to DEF when equipped with a spear.

name: Synch Guard
description: When defending, decrease damage taken by adjacent ally units by 10%.

name: Still Standing
description: When HP is reduced to 0, restore it to 1 and prevent death. (Once per battle)

name: Hero's Shield
description: When defending, protect adjacent ally units by taking attacks in their place.

name: Fire Site
description: When protecting, decrease damage taken by 30%.

name: Hold the Line
description: When defending, enemies cannot enter within 2 left or right panel(s).

name: Swift Stance
description: When defending, always counter-attack. (Max 20 times)

name: Defensive Stance
description: Always defend when attacked from the front or side.

name: Gut Instinct
description: Boost area of effect for Hero's Shield by 4 panels.

name: Cursed Dance
description: Increase damage taken by enemies on map by 5%.

name: Death Throes
description: When dying, decrease ATK for enemies on map by -30%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Contagious Curse
description: If status ailment remains at end of turn, adjacent enemies mirror it.

name: Gloomy Dance
description: Decrease critical rate by -20% for enemies on map.

name: Dullness Dance
description: Decrease movement for enemies on map by -2. (Doesn't stack)

name: Dying Breath
description: Upon death, paralyze random enemy unit on map.

name: Alluring Dance
description: When attacked by males, they have a 30% chance of being charmed.

name: Deadly Footwear
description: Decrease movement by -1. Increase damage dealt by 20%.
notes: Formerly "Movement becomes -1. Increase damage dealt by 20%."

name: Best Service
description: When using healing item, increase healing power by 100%.

name: Waste Not, Want Not
description: When using healing item, 50% chance of non-consumption.

name: Magnificent Cheer
description: Increase attacking power of male allies by 10%.

name: Fierce Attack
description: When attacking male units, increase damage dealt by 75%.

name: Elemental Force
description: Increase elemental attack power by element resist value.

name: Elemental Rise
description: Increase resistances to all elements except star by 10%.

name: Mana Blade
description: Add 50% of INT to ATK power when attacking normally with a sword.
notes: Unlike in 6, this is fixed to only affect normal attacks, and not literally every attack.

name: Oracle Sword
description: Recover 20% of damage dealt as SP when attacking normally with a sword.

name: Spirit Protection
description: Increase resistance of all allies to all elements except star by 10%.

name: Spirit Gun
description: Add unit's highest resistance element to non-elemental attacks.
notes: Formerly "When attacking non-elementally, add unit's highest resistance as elemental attack."

name: Psychic Force
description: After attacking, decrease stats of target unit by -10%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Psychokinesis
description: Increase lift range by 1.

name: Shock Wave
description: If an enemy 3 or more panels away attacks, increase DEF power by 30%.

name: Psychic Shackles
description: When attacking, decrease target movement by-2. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Brainwash Wave
description: After attacking, 5% chance of inflicting puppet on targets.

name: Teleport
description: Switches movement type to Warp.

name: Latest Meds
description: Boost stat-increasing effects by 100% when using Specials
notes: I.e. buff effect doubles. Stat buff cap is still 200% total.

name: Clinical Trial
description: At end of turn, status ailments are healed but stats decrease by 20%.

name: Philosopher's Egg
description: When equipped with a staff, add 30% of base INT to DEF.

name: Good Management
description: Halve the range expansion of magic power.

name: Enhancements
description: When using Specials, increase one of your stats by 30%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Extended Heal
description: When using healing item, extend range in a 5-panel T-shape.

name: Panel Blaster
description: When attacking, increase damage by 10% per unit targeted.

name: Zone Control
description: When attacking, increase accuracy by 10% per unit targeted.

name: Three Laws
description: Will not hit allies in area of effect when attacking.

name: Multi-Lock
description: When attacking, increase critical rate by 5% per unit targeted.

name: Firepower Mode
description: Increase ATK power by 50%, but decrease movement by -5 and jump power by -50.
notes: Formerly "Increase ATK power by 50%, but set movement to -5 and jump power to -50."

name: Mana Charge
description: After attacking, recover 3% SP per unit targeted.

name: Angelic Protection
description: Reduce ally damage within 3 panels by 5%. (Max 30%)

name: Angelic Rituals
description: When using magic, increase power by one level.

name: Angelic Blessings
description: Restores 10% of adjacent ally HP at the end of the turn.

name: Angelic Immunity
description: Decrease rate of status debuffs received by 100%.

name: Angelic Shield
description: Ally units within 3 panels ignore deathblow.

name: Angelic Flight
description: Allies on the map switch movement type to Flying.

name: Explosive Body
description: Explode when thrown or taking explosive damage. Surrounding units take damage.

name: Cross Bomber
description: When this unit explodes, it explodes in straight lines of 5 panels.

name: Defensive Line
description: Increase all weapon resistance by 3% per adjacent ally.

name: Through Adversity
description: Increase stats by 35% when inflicted with an ailment.

name: Focused Bomb
description: When this unit explodes, increase damage dealt by 100%.

name: Recycle Spirit
description: If this unit dies by exploding, the number of dispatched units recovers.

name: Group Tactics
description: Increase stats by 5% per ally within 2 panel(s).
notes: Formerly "Increase stats by number of allies within 2 panel(s)."

name: Full Power Swing
description: Increase critical damage by 75% and accuracy by -30%.

name: Patience
description: When remaining HP is 25% or less, increase attack power by 30%.

name: Borrowed Power
description: When adjacent allies are at a higher level, increase attack power by 30%.

name: Group Psychology
description: Increase stats by 5% of number of allies on map.

name: Full Speed Ahead
description: Increase attack power by 50% and accuracy by -30%.

name: Weak Aura
description: When attacked by humanoid unit, reduce damage taken by 30%.

name: Nail File
description: Increase critical rate by 10% when using Specials.

name: Calm Aura
description: Nullifies damage when attacked by allies.

name: Sleep Attack
description: Increase damage dealt by 100% when attacking a sleeping unit.

name: Cat Step
description: Increase evasion rate by 50% if elevation is higher than the target's.

name: Tribalism
description: Increases stats by 10% per same class ally on the map.

name: Magic Creation
description: At the end of the turn, restore 10% of SP.

name: Lamentations
description: Increase INT by 50% when remaining HP is 25% or less.

name: Ethereal Blast
description: Increase damage dealt by 60% when attacking an unit with amnesia.

name: Focused Spirit
description: When equipped with INT Monster Weapon, add 30% of base RES to INT.

name: Incancations
description: When attacking, reduce target unit’s RES by -30%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Transparent Body
description: When attacked with a weapon skill, decrease damage taken by 50%.

name: Spreading Miasma
description: Increase enemy ailment infliction & stat drop chance by 5%.

name: Poison Powder
description: 50% chance to inflict Poison when attacking normally.

name: Sleep Powder
description: 25% chance to inflict Sleep when attacking normally.

name: Poison Accelerator
description: Increase Poison damage dealt to enemies on map by 25%.
notes: TO DO: Is there a cap? What's normal poison damage?

name: Lengthen Ailment
description: Status ailments will last 2 turns longer on enemies.

name: Overdose
description: Increase damage dealt to units affected by an ailment skill by 60%.

name: Predation
description: Recover 10% of damage dealt as HP.

name: Plague Spewer
description: When attacking, increase aliment affliction and stat drop chances by 20%.

name: Poison Chance
description: Increase damage dealt to poisoned units by 100%.

name: Undead
description: Increase defense by 50%, but reverse the recovery of healing Specials.

name: Regeneration
description: When attacked, recover HP equal to 30% of damage taken.

name: Corpse Cannibal
description: Recover HP & SP by 5% per unit defeated.

name: Mushroom Power
description: Decrease stats by -20% for adjacent female enemies.

name: Exhaustion Spores
description: 25% chance of inflicting Weaken when attacking normally.

name: Season to Taste
description: Recover extra 5% of target’s SP when using healing item.

name: Manly Valor
description: When attacked by female units, reduce damage taken by 25%.

name: Mushroom Doping
description: Boost one stat of choice by 20% when turn ends. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Eryngi Essence
description: 30% chance of acquiring Mushroom Soup when attacked.
notes: Formerly "mushroom soup".

name: Run Them Down
description: If target unit’s HP is at or under 10% when attacking, attack again.

name: Exploding Punch
description: Enemies adjacent to target also take damage when attacking normally.

name: Joint Maneuvers
description: Increase damage correction by 5% during a joint attack.

name: Life on the Line
description: Increase ATK power by 50% and DEF power by -100%.

name: Vendetta
description: Counter-attacks have a 10% chance to deathblow.
notes: Formerly "Counter-attacks are 10% of deathblow."

name: Parry and Strike
description: If not defending when attacked, counter-attack first. (Max 5 time(s))
notes: Formerly "If not defending when attacked, counter-attack first."

name: Lovely Song
description: Increase stats of all allies on the map by 5%.

name: Happy Song
description: Increase EXP gain for all allies on the map by 30%.

name: Fortune Song
description: Increase Mana gain for all allies on the map by 30%.

name: Cute Song
description: Increase recovery from Specials for all allies on the map by 50%.

name: Charmy Song
description: Increase team attack rate of all allies on the map by 10%.

name: Lucky Song
description: Increase critical rate of all allies on the map by 5%.

name: Sweet Aroma
description: Recover 20% of HP for allies within 2 panels at the end of turn.

name: Prevention
description: Nullify status ailments for allies within 2 panels.

name: Herbal Therapy
description: Increase fire, wind, water resistance for adjacent allies by 50%.

name: Relaxation
description: Reduce SP cost for Specials by -50% for adjacent allies.
notes: Unlike Disgaea 5 this is additive! Doesn't cap at -100% because evilities can increase costs, though the minimum cost is 1 SP.

name: Power Aroma
description: Increase ATK power by 20% for allies within 2 panels when turn ends. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Leaf Shield
description: Increase DEF & RES by 30% for allies within 2 panels when turn ends. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Corpse
description: Upon death, revive with 20% of HP. (Once per battle)

name: Nerve Toxin
description: 10% chance to inflict Paralysis when attacking.

name: Automatic Healing
description: Recover 5% of HP when attacked.

name: Death Corridors
description: Boosts stats by 10% every time an ally dies. (Max 100%)

name: Crumbling Body
description: Attacks increased by 1, but dies at when the turn ends.
notes: Formerly "Attacks increased by 1, then dies at when the turn ends."

name: Limit Cut
description: Increase damage dealt by 100%, but take damage equal to 10% of HP when attacking.

name: Sexy Aura
description: Decrease stats of adjacent male enemies by -20%.

name: Temptation
description: 25% chance to inflict Charm when attacking normally.

name: Punishing Punisher
description: Increase damage dealt to charmed units by 100%.

name: Bones Out
description: After attacking, decrease DEF of target unit by -30%. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: Shame
description: Increase stats by 5% per male unit on the map.

name: Pheromones
description: Charm adjacent male enemies at end of turn.

name: Evil Eye
description: When attacking, lower target unit's defense power by -30%.

name: Longhorn
description: 30% chance to increase damage dealt by 100% when attacking normally.

name: Petrifying Gaze
description: 50% chance to inflict Paralysis when attacking normally.

name: Inner Beast
description: Increase ATK by 25% and DEF by 25%, but set INT & RES to 1.

name: One Hit Wonder
description: Increase damage dealt by 20% when defeating an enemy with full HP. (Max 200%)

name: Cursed Gaze
description: For every ailment a target has, decrease target unit's defense power by -25%.

name: Immortal Body
description: Decrease damage taken from physical attacks by 50%.

name: Death Fang
description: Increase damage dealt to paralyzed units by 100%.

name: Blood Insanity
description: When attacking a unit below 50% HP, increase damage dealt by 50%.

name: Turbo Boost
description: If this unit did not move in a turn, increase movement by 10 the next turn.

name: Shield Dash
description: Decrease damage taken by 3% per panel moved this turn.

name: Combat High
description: Increase attack power by 10% per unit defeated by allies. (Max 100%)

name: Rising Dragon
description: Increase attack power by 10% per attack received. (Max 100%)

name: Dragon's Hoard
description: Increase stats by 10% when an Emblem is equipped.

name: Dragonscales
description: Increase defense power by 50% when HP is above 80%.
notes: Formerly "Increase defense power by 50% when HP is above 90%."?

name: Cull the Weak
description: Increase damage dealt to weakened units by 100%.

name: Fetters
description: Seal Special skills, but increase stats by 50%.

name: King's Dignity
description: Increase damage dealt to Boss units by 65%.

name: Shellacker
description: Increase defense power by 10% per attack received. (Max 100%)

name: Herculean Pincers
description: Stats cannot fall below 75%.

name: Crabwalk
description: 30% chance of evading attacks from the front.

name: Shell Hammer
description: 50% chance to inflict Amnesia when attacking normally.

name: Exoskeleton
description: Decrease damage taken from the side and from behind by 50%.

name: Majestic Carapace
description: Cannot be lifted or knocked back, increase stats by 10% and counter-attacks by 1.

name: Holy Smokes
description: When attacking without moving, increase damage dealt by 50%.

name: Anti-Elements
description: When HP is below 25%, increase all elemental resistances by 50%.

name: Long Range
description: When attacking, increase damage dealt by 10% per number of panels from target. (Max 100%）

name: Double Lock
description: Guaranteed hit when using the same attack twice.

name: Precision Instrument
description: Increase critical rate by 35% and wind resistance by -50%.

name: Focused Attack
description: Increase damage dealt by 10% per empty panel in attack range. (Max 100%）
notes: Not worth it for magic spells, which have a separate multiplier (x1.0, x0.9, ..., x0.2) as range increases.

name: Utter Chaos
description: When attacking, randomly changes defense to other stat.

name: Purifying Ailment
description: Guaranteed critical when inflicting ailment, but target’s ailment will heal.
notes: Does this actually mean "if target has ailment"?

name: Abyss Gazer
description: When affected by a status ailment, inflict it on targeted unit.

name: Unorthodox Ways
description: Increase damage dealt by 50%, but decrease own HP by 10% when performing magical attacks.
notes: TO DO: Presumably the damage boost is only for magic attacks?

name: Cloth of Truth
description: Reduce damage taken by 50%, but can’t evade attacks.

name: Outer Gods
description: Increase stats by 50% when no units are adjacent.

name: Metal Barrier
description: Nullify damage taken that is less than unit's Max HP.

name: Poison Vaccine
description: Immune to poison and toxins.

name: Paralysis Vaccine
description: Immune to paralysis.

name: Sleep Vaccine
description: Immune to sleep.

name: Weaken Vaccine
description: Immune to weakening.

name: Forget Vaccine
description: Immune to amnesia.

name: Charm Vaccine
description: Immune to charm.

name: Stun Vaccine
description: Immune to stun.

name: Puppet Vaccine
description: Immune to being puppeted.

name: Reverse Vaccine
description: Immune to reversal.

name: Bind Vaccine
description: Immune to binding.

name: Freeze Vaccine
description: Immune to freezing.

name: Vaccine
description: Decrease chance of being afflicted with ailments by 50%.

description: Increase fist resistance by 20%.

name: Sword Guard
description: Increase sword resistance by 20%.

description: Increase spear resistance by 20%.

description: Increase bow resistance by 20%.

description: Increase gun resistance by 20%.

name: Axe Guard
description: Increase axe resistance by 20%.

description: Increase fire resistance by 25%.

name: Windy Body
description: Increase wind resistance by 25%.

name: Cool Body

name: Kill with Wind
description: Decrease wind resistance for other units on the map by -15%.

name: Kill with Water
description: Decrease water resistance for other units on the map by -15%.

name: Power Shot
description: Increase attack power by 10% when attacking normally.

name: Piercing Shot
description: Normal attacks deal damage to units between self and target.

name: Mana Scarcity
description: Set Mana gain to 30%, but increase attack power by 50%.

name: Opportunist
description: Increase damage dealt by 20% on even turns.

name: Power Booster
description: Increase damage dealt with Unique Skills by 15%.

name: Magic Booster
description: Increase damage dealt with spells by 15%.

name: Ambush
description: Increase attack power by 20% on the turn unit is dispatched.

name: No Critical
description: Increase attack power by 10%, but disable critical hits.

name: Gambler
description: Increase critical damage by 100%, but with a 50% chance of dealing 0 damage.

name: Bad Trip
description: 10% chance to inflict Poison, Sleep, and Paralysis when attacking normally.

name: Unstable Power
description: Increase stats by 50%, but decrease stats by -20% every turn.

name: Convert Force
description: Decrease all elemental resistances to -50%, but increase stats by 25%.

name: Power of Bowls
description: Increase stats by 5% per remaining Evility cost.

name: Counter Contemptor
description: Will not counter-attack, but increase stats by 20%.

name: Taste of Victory
description: Increase stats by 1% per time current stage has been cleared. (Max 100%)

name: Magic Bias
description: Decrease Max HP by -50%, but increase Max SP by 100%.

name: Revitalizing Power
description: Increase effects of healing Specials on self by 25%.

name: Improved Recovery
description: Increase effects of healing Specials on self by 50%.

name: Medical Expertise
description: Increase effects of healing Specials on self by 100%.

name: Treatment Testing
description: Increase effects of healing Specials on self by 200%.

name: Too Flat to Hit
description: Increase evasion by 10% if this unit is a flat-chested female.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Increase accuracy by 10%.

name: Safety
description: When attacked, hits taken will not be critical.

name: Enemy Lure
description: Increase chance of being the target of enemy attacks.

name: Assassin's Soul
description: Nullify evasion-increasing effects from target unit Evilities.

name: Handicap
description: When attacking, lower level targets will survive fatal damage with 1 HP.

name: Magical Mini Craft
description: Decrease stats by -10%, but movement type becomes Flying.

name: Normal Soul
description: Set all elemental and weapon resistances to 0%.

name: Geo Heal
description: Reverse damage taken from Geo Effects.

name: Stalker Style
description: Set movement of Lucky Boards to 1.

name: Auto Recovery
description: Recover 5% HP at end of turn.

name: Gourmet
description: Increase effects of recovery items used on unit by 100%.

name: Hidden Blessing
description: Recover 10% HP when attacked from behind.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Unit can move again after breaking a treasure chest.

name: Image Change
description: Switch values of HP & SP, and ATK & INT.

name: Seal of Betrayal
description: Deathblow ally units when attacking them.

name: Counter Knowledge
description: Increase number of counter-attacks by 1%.
notes: No, this hasn't been corrected yet.

name: Number Padding
description: Add 1 to defeated target count when defeating quest targets.

name: Gender Bender
description: Switch gender of unit.

name: Super Jump
description: Increase jump power when controlling this unit in the Base.

name: Board Killer
description: Increase attack power by 50% when attacking Lucky Boards.

name: Gum Eater
description: Increase recovery effect of Mint Gum by 10000%, though it won't become ABC Gum.

name: Damage Reward
description: Obtain HL when dealing damage to enemies.

name: Life Insurance
description: Obtain HL when defeated. (Ally-caused death doesn't count)

name: Alter Sound System
description: Change system sounds to this unit's voice when controlling them in the Base.

name: Boss Lv 1
description: Gain Boss element, nullify deathblows, and reduce effects of Poison/Paralysis/Weaken.
notes: Gives +90% resistance; reduces poison damage to 60%, paralysis SPD drop to 60%, and weaken to 15%.

name: Boss Lv 2
description: Gain Boss element, nullify deathblows, and considerably reduce effects of Poison/Paralysis/Weaken.
notes: Gives +80% resistance; reduces poison damage to 80%, paralysis SPD drop to 80%, and weaken to 20%.

name: Boss Lv 3
description: Gain Boss element, nullify deathblows, and greatly reduce effects of Poison/Paralysis/Weaken.
notes: Gives +95% resistance; reduces poison damage to 40%, paralysis SPD drop to 40%, and weaken to 10%.

name: Boss Lv 4
description: Gain Boss element, nullify deathblows, and virtually nullify effects of Poison/Paralysis/Weaken.
notes: Gives +98% resistance; reduces poison damage to 20%, paralysis SPD drop to 20%, and weaken to 5%.

name: Status Guard
description: Ally units' stats cannot fall below 75%

name: Hang Tough
description: Stats cannot fall below 90%.

name: Trap Card
description: Upon dying, revive Jumbified.

name: Demon Shogi Pawn
description: Can’t enter base panel and can't change equipment.

name: Infernal Corrosion
description: When attacking an enemy, obtain Extract equal to its stats.
notes: Cannot create a Secret Scroll of this; you get 1/100 000 of stats, i.e. up to 999 per enemy.

name: Seal of Power
description: When defeating a Boss unit in an Item World, permanently gain a portion of its stats.

name: S.O. Seal
description: Multiply own Seal of Power stat gain effect by 10.

name: Absolute Power
description: Cannot be lifted, nullify knockback, and stats cannot be reduced below Z%.

name: No Counter
description: Does not counter-attack when attacked.

name: No Explosion Day
description: Nullify own explosion.
